data.name: has_home_page
data.description_label: Starting page of the website. It contains a description of the product/service and the company and users can access other sub-pages of the website from this page.

data.name: has_contact_us_page
data.description_label: Users can send a message to the site owner by filling in a form. The form can contain many details (personal details, subject of the message, etc.)

data.name: has_catalog_page
data.description_label: The products listing page

data.name: has_login
data.description_label: Users have the option to register on the site and then log in and out

data.name: has_booking_engine
data.description_label: Users can book an appointment via the website

data.name: has_admin
data.description_label: A user interface that allows the site owner to list and edit the site database

data.name: has_home_page
data.description_label: Starting page of the website. It contains a description of the product/service and the company and users can access other sub-pages of the website from this page.

data.name: has_products_page
data.description_label: The products listing page

data.name: has_cart
data.description_label: Users put their purchases in a basket and then buy selected products in a single order

data.name: has_login
data.description_label: Users have the option to register on the site and then log in and out

data.name: has_card_payment
data.description_label: Users can pay with credit card

data.name: has_smart_bill
data.description_label: Bills are generated automatically

data.name: has_courier_integration
data.description_label: The website is linked to a delivery service

data.name: has_facebook_login
data.description_label: Users can login with facebook account

data.name: has_contact_us_page
data.description_label: Users can send a message to the site owner by filling in a form. The form can contain many details (personal details, subject of the message, etc.)

data.name: has_excel_product_import
data.description_label: The website owner can upload data about the products via an excel file

data.name: has_related_products
data.description_label: View the related products on the product website

data.name: has_product_filters
data.description_label: Users can search for specific products by keyword, price or other product attributes

data.name: has_product_ratings
data.description_label: Users can rate products from one to five and can write reviews about products which will be displayed on the product page. The average rating is displayed on the product page

data.name: has_favorite_products
data.description_label: Users have the possibility to add any product to their favorites with a button

data.name: has_featured_products
data.description_label: The website owner may display certain products. Featured products are listed higher in the product list than other products

data.name: has_coupon
data.description_label: The site owner may sell customer coupons that customers can use in their purchases

data.name: has_admin
data.description_label: A user interface that allows the site owner to list and edit the site database

data.name: has_buy_notifications
data.description_label: Site owner receives a notification after each purchase

data.name: has_news_blog
data.description_label: A separate page for news/blog
